Data Access¶

deeg.load_data(fname, *, preload=False, verbose=None, **kwargs)¶

load common data file types (csv, edf, bdf, gdf, vhdr, fif, fif.gz, set, cnt, mff, nxe, hdr, mat, bin, data, sqd, con, ds, txt).

Parameters

  • fname (str) – files you are gonna read

  • mne (str) – indicate if the file is mne-supported

Returns

numpy array of EEG data

deeg.load_DEAP(path)¶

Load DEAP dataset and convert it to numpy array with dimension (p, m, e). DEAP dataset contains 32 participant files and the path points to the folder that stores those files.

Parameters

path (str) – path to DEAP dataset

Returns

numpy array of data and labels

deeg.load_NeuroMarketing(path)¶

Load NeuroMarketing dataset and convert it to numpy array with dimension (p, m, e). NeuroMarketing dataset contains 25 participant files and the path points to the folder that stores those files.

Parameters

path (str) – path to NeuroMarketing dataset

Returns

numpy array of data and labels

deeg.load_SEED(folder_path, feature_name, frequency_band)¶

Load SEED dataset and convert it to numpy array with dimension (p, m, e).

Parameters

  • folder_path (str) – directory of ExtractedFeatures

  • feature_name (str) – feature name, for example ‘de_LDS’, ‘asm_LDS’ etc. Take de_LDS1 as an example: the demension is (62, 235, 5), 62 for 62 channels, 235 for 235 seconds and 5 for 5 different frequency bands.

  • frequency_band (str) – the input band name: ‘delta’, ‘theta’, ‘alpha’, ‘beta’, ‘gamma’

:return numpy array of data and labels
